name: cleveland
content:
Cleveland noun
(IN UK)
Add to word list
Add to word list
an area in northeastern England that was a county (= an area with its own local government) until 1996: He's from Middlesborough in Cleveland. He was rescued 2 miles off the Cleveland coast.
More examplesFewer examplesIf the scheme proves a success it could spread throughout Cleveland and North Yorkshire. I remember the first gig I went to in Cleveland.Cleveland is twinned with Ballymena in Northern Ireland.

Cleveland noun
(IN US)
a large city in Ohio, a state in the northeastern US: He returned to his native Cleveland. The family lives near Cleveland.
More examplesFewer examplesShe went to Florida to get away from Cleveland's cold winters.This is the first time Cleveland has faced such a problem.
